credentials_json.description: The contents of your Service Account Key JSON file. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
credentials_json.title: Credentials JSON

project_id.description: For single project - the GCP project ID for the project containing the target BigQuery dataset.
project_id.title: Project ID

dataset_id.description: For single project - the dataset ID to search for tables and views. If not specified, all datasets will be included.
dataset_id.title: Dataset ID

project_ids.description: For multiple project -  the GCP project IDs to sync data from. If specified, data will be synced from these projects instead of project_id. The service account must have BigQuery read access to all listed projects. The first project id in this list will be used for billing
project_ids.title: Project IDs

dataset_ids.description: For multiple project -  the dataset IDs to search for tables and views. When specified, only tables from these datasets will be synced. If a dataset does not exist in a project, it will be skipped. If not specified, all datasets will be included.
dataset_ids.title: Dataset IDs
